entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.6°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
